name: Tricks And Treats Blitz
description:
Welcome to the devilishly fun party of Tricks and Treats Blitz! Play for free and match as many spooky Halloween-themed pieces as you can in one minute rounds. Earn tons of gold, charge your powerups and win the first place in weekly tournaments.


SPOOKY POWERS. Swipe dozens of pieces at a time with Scythe. Unleash specially trained Bats from Midnight Castle to collect pieces for you. Eliminate all pieces of certain type with powerful Lightning hits. Other bonuses will help you to explode pumpkins, multiply your score or get additional time.


CONQUER THE LEADERBOARD Use your skills to set the highest score. Challenge you friends on Facebook and get the best results which no one can beat to become a weekly tournament champion!

EASY TO LEARN  Never played Tricks and Treats Blitz before? No problem! The game is suitable for all. Interactive tutorial quickly prepares you for achieving the best results in this cool Halloween matching party.

You’re going to love Tricks Blitz! Please rate the game below, give us some feedback and tell us what you think. It will help to make the game even better!
